alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 9:50PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS ALONG A COLD FRONT WILL IMPACT NASSAU...BRADFORD...CENTRAL ALACHUA...SOUTHEASTERN BAKER...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM...CENTRAL UNION... CLAY...DUVAL...CAMDEN...GLYNN...EAST CENTRAL BRANTLEY AND SOUTHEASTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EST... At 949 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cox to near Alachua. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Gainesville, St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Fernandina Beach, Orange Park, Starke, and Hilliard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
